environment_variables.root_dir: The directory two levels up from the current working directory
environment_variables.LD_LIBRARY_PATH: The path to the core library directory
environment_variables.PYTHONPATH: The path to the dask library directory
environment_variables.cores: The number of cores per node divided by 2
environment_variables.NGRAPHS: The number of graphs to run
environment_variables.STEPS: The number of steps for the benchmark
